nodes.bodyText: Can we log a metric here? Will be easier to track. Otherwise this will get lost in log messages.

When a latch times out, it actually doesn't throw an exception, it just returns false, so the return value has to be checked. The InterruptedException is only thrown if the thread is actually interrupted.

udpate -> update
Was the previous javadoc inaccurate? It seems like the old code would have also thrown an exception on not found.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -248,7 +249,7 @@ public FindResult findEntriesSince(String partitionPath, FindToken findToken, lo
    * @param blobId The {@link BlobId} to update.
    * @param fieldName The metadata field to modify.
    * @param value The new value.
-   * @return {@code true} if the udpate succeeded, {@code false} if the metadata record was not found.
+   * @return {@code true} if the udpate succeeded, {@code false} if no update was needed.

@@ -248,7 +249,7 @@ public FindResult findEntriesSince(String partitionPath, FindToken findToken, lo
    * @param blobId The {@link BlobId} to update.
    * @param fieldName The metadata field to modify.
    * @param value The new value.
-   * @return {@code true} if the udpate succeeded, {@code false} if the metadata record was not found.
+   * @return {@code true} if the udpate succeeded, {@code false} if no update was needed.
